
Amgaon is a village in the Gadchiroli district  with an area of 1473.5 hectares, harbouring 1007 households and with total population of 4021 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town is DESAIGANJ at a distance of < 5 km.

There are 5 pre-primary schools in the village
There are 4 primary schools in the village
There are 2 Middle schools in the village
There are 2 Secondary schools in the village
The nearest Senior secondary school is at a distance of < 5 km from the village.
The nearest Degree colleges of arts  science & commerce is at a distance of < 5 km from the village.
The nearest Engineering college is at a distance of < 5 km from the village.
